code: import React from'react';import BotCard from'./BotCard';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BotCollection=_ref=>{let{bots,selectBot,dischargeBot}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bot-collection",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"ALL BOTS"}),bots.map(bot=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:bot.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BotCard,{bot:bot,onClick:selectBot},bot.id),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button red-button",onClick:()=>dischargeBot(bot.id),children:"X"})]},bot.id))]});};export default BotCollection;
